name: Ashen Path
text: You grant the creature touched the ability to breathe with ease air that is contaminated with ash, spores, smoke, dust, or the like. The creature suffers no ill effects from natural airborne irritants or contaminants and gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against magical effects that involve any of these contaminants. In addition, the creature can see through magical obscuring effects caused by dense ash, smoke, fog, or similar concealment up to a distance of 60 feet, although this spell does nothing to enhance sight in dark or shadowy conditions. You can cast this spell on multiple creatures, but if you do, divide the duration evenly among all the creatures you touch (to a minimum duration of 10 minutes per target).
text_zh: 你让被触碰的生物能够在被灰尘、孢子、烟雾、尘土或类似物体污染的空气中自如地呼吸。生物不会因自然刺激物或污染物而承受不良效果，并且在对抗包含任意上述污染物的魔法效果时，豁免检定获得+4加值。此外，该生物可以看穿厚重的灰烬、烟、雾气（dense ash, smoke, fog）或类似隐蔽物造成的魔法遮蔽（obscuring）效果，距离最多60尺，不过此法术并不会强化角色在黑暗或昏暗状况中的视物距离。你可以对多名生物施展此法术，但你这样做的时候必须将持续时间平均分布到所有你触碰的生物身上（每个生物身上的持续时间最少须有10分钟）。
